website_summaries.verdict: With a trio of premium tools, a 100% waterproof design, and with 45 minutes of shaving, the Verso is Remington’s the most versatile and practical electric razor.
pros: Features trimming, scrubbing, detailer, and shaving tools
Can be comfortably used with or without water
cons: 45 minutes of usage per charge is excellent, but 4 hours on the charger isn’t great

website_summaries.verdict: This shaver's innovative grippable design gives you more control for an even cut. Its battery life, however, is less impressive.
pros: Unique ergonomic handle with grippy rubber finish
Head adjusts to almost any angle to cut down on irritation
Works on a variety of lengths
Gives you 45 minutes of shaving on a four-hour charge
cons: Some are disappointed with this shaver's battery life

customer_reviews.title: Transition from blade: great unit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this daily for about a month. Here’s what I’ve noticed. 1. Using this dry can be uncomfortable 2. Using this with shaving cream requires frequent rinsing or it bogs down 3. Using this with Williams Lectric Shave works well 4. Pre-shave brush doesn’t make any difference 5. Face cleaning brushes are nice 6. For weekly cleaning instructions say to put the heads back in accordance with colors...which do not exist. You need to track positions yourself. 7. Weekly cleaning process is not onerous 8. Trimmer works well for sideburns and eyebrows I would purchase it again, however if it didn’t include the brushes there would be no loss
customer_reviews.author: W. Raper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third electric razor I have tried for shaving my head. I do not have male pattern baldness, but have a full head of thick coarse hair and decided to shave it for Halloween. This little razor does a pretty good job in the shower with shaving cream. Maybe not as close as a blade, but I have gotten no nicks or cuts from it. The handle and shaving head position works well and is a good design. The rotary blades are very smooth and cut well considering how much hair I have. I have found that it works better when there is a decent amount of stubble.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver for the head.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a previous shaver for my head and I was unsure if this was up to the task, however it is working far better than expected. I wish i found something like this sooner. Great Shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Loud, poor results, and irritating.
customer_reviews.text: Loud, cheap, and does a really poor job of shaving. I don't have a heavy beard, so that may contribute, but this was a very disappointing purchase. I don't know if I can return it after a few shaves so this might be a total loss. I could not go to work after shaving with this razor, either I would have a poor shave or my skin would be worn raw. I really do *NOT* recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Misses some hair; needs several passes
customer_reviews.text: I used a electric razor long ago but have wore a bread for many years. I needed to shave for an operation and liked the hype. I was going to use it to remove my beard and afterwards to keep my neck trimmed. I knew it would be difficult to remove my beard and will give it a pass for removing a long time beard but I have a great deal of trouble shaving my neck and cheeks. It misses hairs, clips them short and take several passes to get a clean shave. I tried the pre-shave lotions and conditioners recommended to no avail. Bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: B .....

customer_reviews.title: design ease of handling storage it could have been a solid 4
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cap used to protect the heads are cheap and the tabs brake off real easy. Had the first one replaced for free by customer service. Fantastic service by them. I ordered two additional plastic caps and glad I did as the one replaced by CS broke before the additional ones arrived. Need to make a better cap. If the cap were better It would be a 4 star and if the razor cut better and did not pull the hair out it would have been a total 5 so folks get on back to the design table and make it a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fisher/ Mike Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Almost works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try the elecrtric razor shaving again after a lot of years with razors. I never had a lot of luck with many different brands or styles in the past because they just never do a good job. The rotary style has a better cut for me than any of the others, even when using the pre-shave products. I'm getting older now and no matter what the "safety style razor" even though a good shave tends to tear up my face. This razor, just as others just always leaves a lot of unshaven hair so I end up using a razor anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - not good either,  just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an almost 20 year old Phillips shaver. I thought that in that amount of time the technology must have surely improved and it was time to get a new shaver. Well, I was wrong. This is no better than my old Phillips - other then the shape they are almost identical, except this Remington is a lot louder. Well at least its new and it works okay. It is waterproof and I can use it with shaving cream, so that is a plus. Maybe I was expecting too much at this price point?
customer_reviews.author: Boba Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This product is TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Stay away. This isn't deserving of even one star, but I had to give it one to submit the comments. The product, like others have said, is difficult to turn on/off. The brush heads are small - almost the size of a quarter. The brush head speed is slow. Very disappointed. Returned almost immediately. Stick with Clarsonic or simply buy a Salux wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Does it shave?
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money if you are over 60. As our skin looses its elasticity, its difficult to find an electric razor that works. Well, this ain't the one to buy. If you have "peach fuzz"? It'll work just fine. I am searching for an electric razor that will work and not spend $150 for a Braun that I bought. Onward.
customer_reviews.author: truckerloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Attachment heads easily interchanged, batter charged quick, and was able to use shortly after it arrived. I like that electric razors had advanced to be able to use in shower and also trim facial hair. Only marked down 1 star simply because I’ve always gotten a better shave from a manual razor. Got this for quick convenience, but definitely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Will break with regular use.
customer_reviews.text: This was a useful tool, yet I have had it for 3 months and one of the blades is no longer working properly. Of course, the warranty does not cover the blades, so now I just need to spend more money and by a different product. I do no recommend buying this product, it will give you the illusion that it will last, and then the part of it that is not on warranty will break.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: With this thing I keep the head shaved and beard at 2 days length easy..
customer_reviews.text: So I’m bald and I razor shave my head once or twice a week along with my face. My wife hates when a shave all at once because I turn into an egg. With this thing I keep the head shaved and beard at 2 days length easy ...and everyone is happy I wish I’d found it earlier Works great Very easy to use and fits in any bag Perfect for traveling people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves this. He uses this to shave his head so he has that baby smooth feel to it, so by default I love it too. I did accidentally knock it off the counter once and it broke in a few pieces. He was able to put it back together so it still seems to works great because he still uses it all the time <3
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: The WORST shaver I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The WORST shaver I've ever owned. It cuts, it burns, it shreds skin. It causes rashes and pimples. It's weak, underpowered and damned near impossible to clean. I used it for two weeks and finally threw the whole mess away in disgust. I didn't even want to give it away to a friend because it's such a cheap, unworkable, crappy piece of technology. I had a nice Remington wet/dry years ago that worked wonderfully. but this thing seems like it was invented by a particularly sadistic gnome whose only intent was to cause great pain and prolonged suffering. Never again will I buy a Remington product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older Skull Shaver I couldn’t get blades for anymore. Works great shaving my head, but works best if I use it every other day. If I wait longer I will need to us a trimmer first. This is a very good deal compared to what I was using.
customer_reviews.author: James Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Close shave happens in the Shower
customer_reviews.text: Requires a short stubble (has trimmer on side; Best to remove shave head) to get a close shave which MUST be obtained in a hot shower with CREMO shave cream. The Brush Head is nice 👍 and more attachments would be great!
customer_reviews.author: DynamicDavid.me

customer_reviews.title: Takes More Time To shave
customer_reviews.text: It takes longer to shave with the three headed attachment. It just seams to miss alot so you have to keep on going over your face with it and that can irritate your skin. Its good for trimming but shave? I will leave that up to my good old double side safety razor.
customer_reviews.author: jlaw

customer_reviews.title: Remington XR1410 Shaver Too Much, Too Little...
customer_reviews.text: My 25-year old Remington shaver outperforms this one hands down. Although it comes with several attachments to prep before a shave, you still cannot get a close shave with this one. It takes too much time, to get a clean shave. However, this XR1410 shaver was not half the cost of my original shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Levelle M Laney

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not for all people
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my husband. Do not like He do not get a close shave. I would not get it again. He is not using it. And to last to send back. To me it is well made for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: So this shaver is basically a normal shaver with the bottom 3rd lopped off. It shaves the same as any other and the ergonomics produced by eliminating the bottom 3rd don't really have much effect. It is working fine but it's nothing special. I probably woudn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: BSO

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it for regular use.
customer_reviews.text: If the hair is longer than minor stubble, it pulls them as much as shaves. It's fine on my face, fair on my head (although I have to go over everything five times or more and remove the blades to clean them at least a dozen times), and scratches the hell out of my neck. My throat looks like I lost a fight with a feral hedgehog. Not horrible, but I wouldn't recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ku Shin

customer_reviews.title: good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Small shaver that's good for travel. Good ergonomics. Nice additional attachments. The plastic shaver cover broke within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Milo Archreach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had heard great things about this razor, and was looking forward to trying it. Unfortunately, the razor itself is not great quality compared to a Norelco (this one is plastic and lightweight) and it does not deliver a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Just average razor
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, but you get what you pay for! I tend to only shave every other day, and the razor attachment is “just okay”. Biggest issue is that if I go a little longer...don’t shave on the weekend, by Monday the shaver pulls more than it cuts! The sideburn trimmer doesn’t work at all, and it’s a pain to switch out attachments just to trim the ear hair and the sideburns.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S. Brightbill

customer_reviews.title: A well-known company disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It only took a few minutes in the shower to see that is very poorly works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works well but it's quite noisy. The hair cutting attachment also misses hairs quite often. I have started shaving my head as it looks better and is more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Scherrie Michel

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: one year update , after 20 uses, can barely hold a charge, has to be recharged constantly, it stopped cutting even though motor runs
customer_reviews.author: taza

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job shaving my head
customer_reviews.text: Gets nearly as close as my Headblade without the skin irritation and is much faster. There is a crease on the back of my head that i can't get to with a blade that this shaver gets with no problem. Takes about 3 minutes if you don't let the hair grow too long. A day or two max. I use Lectric Shave right before and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bates

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give a close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this little shaver fits in your hand. I purchased it for my husband as a gift. But it just isn’t strong enough to get the job done. His facial hair must be too coarse or something so it is disappointing. I was going to return it but he said he would keep it as a backup to his razor.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Two uses and broke
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the razor head broke after two uses and washes. The one of the three spinning units attached to the inside broke leaving only two working. Cannot find replacement part. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave as I experienced, pulled hairs ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a close shave as I experienced, pulled hairs if not shaving slow enough. This took 3 times as long to shave compared to any cheap foil razor. Will go back to foil shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse9mm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wet shaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I purchased a wet shaver and I can’t believe how close of a shave I get!! Excellent product and the price is really good. Plus I love the way it’s hand held!
customer_reviews.author: jgrcic@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love how the razor is easy to hold in your hand. He uses it to shave his face and head everyday. It has held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this thing over and over and over again
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for any man use this brush before you shave and you'll have the softest face in town
customer_reviews.author: jay c livingstone

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative for a blade in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Not as close as a blade but this gives a great cut even after a few days growth. Doesn’t seem to tug and hurt as much as other electric shavers. So for the battery life has well exceeded what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: M Kingery

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I didn’t want to keep having to shave my head. Try to use on a daily basis but, Not good if you have a sensitive head. So still have to use a razor to shave my head. So I use this item now for after I shave to get the stubble. Which works really good. Also if you’re using it daily make sure you clean it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ibn Al-taaib

customer_reviews.title: Want her to kiss you?  Get this!
customer_reviews.text: Great close shave. This is hubby’s favorite electric razor ever. He likes the way it feels in his hands and the shave is kissable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but it’s only useful head is the trimmer but they all will pull hair from time to time even with a full charge. My conscious won’t allow me to return after using so I’m using this until it breaks down
customer_reviews.author: BarnzE

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaving bald head!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great for the head. The shape of the shaver makes it ideal for a close head shave for the bald brotherhood.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dawson

customer_reviews.title: ... work with the plug in my bathroom but worked fine in other plugs around the house oddly enough
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to work with the plug in my bathroom but worked fine in other plugs around the house oddly enough. When it did turn on, it didn't have much power.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick E. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed, great for traveling. Use in the shower is pretty cool. But...might be ok for those with thin beards but cut performance on mine is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Bushrod Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made really bad
customer_reviews.text: This product was great . Until it stopped working. And my return window closed on aug 7th. Barely used this product and it broke. Make real bad.
customer_reviews.author: juliann vento

customer_reviews.title: Bald head
customer_reviews.text: I have an all shave bald head, and this electric shaver keeps me looking clean and sharp everyday. Great handle and adjustment of the header a close shave around my head. Do recommended to keep a bald head shine and crisp (I have a full beard so can't comment on face shave)
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cut my head using a blade so my wife said I needed to go electric!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much disposable
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in 3 months. Started acting up after 3 months, by month 3, it basically fell apart. It is very light and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: CozySEA

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece in less than Two Months of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my husband. He really liked it, however it is now less than two months of use and there is a plastic piece broken. This inner plastic ring is popped out causing the ring outside of the actual razor to spin and not function properly. Unfortunately we are now just 11 days outside of the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Inefficient and pulling hairs
customer_reviews.text: While everything came correctly and the material of the shaver seems to be great quality, the shaver is very weak (had to go over the same spot multiple times) and I could feel it pulling hairs OFTEN
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love it - great for shaving scalp
customer_reviews.text: Love it - great for shaving scalp ... not so great for shaving 3-day beard stubbles. So I guess shave more often :)
customer_reviews.author: O. K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He uses it to shave regularly. It doesn't work as well on his head as I thought it would though. The shave on his face is closer than his head.
customer_reviews.author: sally leach

customer_reviews.title: Handling is great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I wish the motor was more powerful but this is a great value for the price. The handle shape is the best
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Overall size
customer_reviews.text: Heads are very hard to change Shaving with the blades given are not Evan A medium quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for going bald and hasn’t quit on me yet
customer_reviews.text: Because of this, I may never go to a barber again! Great for going bald and hasn’t quit on me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kage.Maru

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, especially compared to other razors I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this by recommendation. Disappointed. Use it on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great shape for shaving your head but the cutters seem to need several passes to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Shape is very convenient for shaving my head. Unfortunately, I have to go over and over areas because it seems to cut unevenly on the first and second passes. Of course, in going over and over areas, you run the risk of irritation. To be fair, I've never used this type of shaver so I don't know if I'm expecting too much on the first pass.
customer_reviews.author: john j.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice that u can use it in the shower Dad loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dewey James Huneycutt Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. If you haven't tried a palm held razor, you might want to try this one. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Widmer

customer_reviews.title: No complainte at all.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I really like the attachments. Best razor I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Critique

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, works well
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, hairs can get stuck inside the attachments however and are difficult to clean internet, overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but my last Remington electric shaver lasted like 4 years. This one..... 3 months. It also feel like I’m taking a chainsaw to my face. Then when I’m done, it looks like I didn’t even shave. Worst $50 I’ve ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Yozamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Faster cut and easier to clean than my Kibiy
customer_reviews.text: Cuts smooth and fast. Much better than my Kibiy. Battery life is good and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Remington
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Remington. I tried a different brand after my last Remington stopped. And Hated that, ALWAYS STICK WITH REMINGTON LOL
customer_reviews.author: j3rzyc41n3

customer_reviews.title: It’s bad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Takes me 5x as long to shave than my old 3 head razor. Really really bad and I can’t believe that Remington, a great name in the market, create and released such a product. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Neal J.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable raxor that provides a nice comortable shave with a good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the the fact that you can use it with water. I get a nice fast, comfortable shave. The razor has very good battery life before it has to be recharged and the company gave me great support when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the shower and the water doesn’t jack it all up. Easy to clean and use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Redus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got this for my husband who shacks and would cut his self shaving he loves this
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA WHITNEY , MRS

customer_reviews.title: Great as a trimmer, sucks as a face shaver
customer_reviews.text: Great as a trimmer and groomer, but sucks as a daily face shaver.
customer_reviews.author: David Doebler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a shaver for a while. Love the price point. Quality and attachments are good. Clean is easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this shaver
customer_reviews.text: Yes, he has mentioned several times how fantastic it works. He said that if he wets his head and using shaving oil it works beautifully. Best if used every day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small & light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice small and light weight. And comes with interchangeable attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Kimk166

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaver! Leaves my bald head smooth as silk. Wet or dry gets the job done, and I love the included attachments.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBoy

customer_reviews.title: It can get wet!
customer_reviews.text: This did everything it promised. I find the side trimmer helpful. It's good for a quick shave when you're pressed for time.
customer_reviews.author: WDinHdG

customer_reviews.title: The price was excellent as the result
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the product; and it is a must buy for Bold men. The price was excellent as the result. Easy to use and didn't feel anything while shaving my head.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel'ange

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, just got it last
customer_reviews.text: So far so good , just got it last week
customer_reviews.author: ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Piece of Crap I ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: It broke within 1 week. A total piece of crap. Just goes to show you, you get what you pay for. I will never purchase a Remington product again!
customer_reviews.author: Gwoz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with this shaver after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this shaver after a few months. One of the heads just developed an annoying humming sound that I've been trying to find the cause of.
customer_reviews.author: RandellHynes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shape
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this razor. I have a shaved head and have been using a norelco triple blade razor. The shape is perfect for hitting all angles of the head. And it shaves very close. Best shaver I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Hilds a charge does great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a few months back. Has been some of the best money ever spent. If you go a few days without shaving it will pull stubble a little bit. But when used daily it works without a hitch. If looking for a electric shavers this one comes highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whisker Grabber.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed. My old worn out razor does a better job. The new one tears out the whiskers vs shearing them off. Thumbs down all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver I have had
customer_reviews.text: Makes some weird grinding noises that do not seem to effect it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Close Shave!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver fits in the palm of your hand and does a good job compared to my old razor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love thus shaving! It does 5 different things and can be used in a shower!
customer_reviews.author: DianeNailTech

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: im getting a very good results when I’m using it to shave my head.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: God alternative to visiing barber
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to use. Saved money from having to visit barber to have my head shaved.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: This is an amendment to my former review. The manufacturer helped me to figure out why the razor was not working so all is well.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design a lot. Unfortunately, after a little over a month it will not take a charge, and I can't return it. I don't know if others have had this problem or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy for the price! Shaves my face pretty well and the smaller body makes for easy handling while shaving. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Arnett

customer_reviews.title: razor
customer_reviews.text: its okay not really good for shaving your head though
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: but getting a good shave.
customer_reviews.text: Shaver was as described online. Still early days and takes time for beard to adjust, but getting a good shave.....Tom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bald guys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and his bald head. He uses it everyday. According to him he has never been more happy, with his shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good razor
customer_reviews.text: No it didn’t add up to my expectations. It is not (I’m not sure how to say what I’m trying today). But it didn’t really cut the beard. It just pulled it more then cut it. Didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Freitas

customer_reviews.title: GOODBY NORELCO!
customer_reviews.text: I have been Norelco since high school. My last Norelco was an Arctec, what a hateful piece of crap that was. I went to Remington a few years ago. It can actually handle MAN sized hair. The Norelco I had to rub my face raw to get all the hairs. I finally broke open the wallet for this beauty! What the heck was I waiting for??? Right outta the box to the face, this baby mowed like no other razor before. It's pretty quiet, seems to have good power, goes in my big mitt of a hand PERFECTLY, and actually handles MAN sized facial hair. It's even $200 cheaper than the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Haukos

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Would get 0 but u cant, its freaking garbage. DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 1st time used. Blades stuck. Do ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 1st time used. Blades stuck. Do not rotate. Tried cleaning but still not working. Am traveling overseas so cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Subir Goyal

customer_reviews.title: Very close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C

customer_reviews.title: The product is not very good if you have a heavy beard
customer_reviews.text: The product is not very good if you have a heavy beard. I clean it multiple times while shaving but it still pulls out the hairs instead of cutting them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Head Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for shaving my head and it is an excellent shaver for this purpose. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Klein

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Broken when cleaning. Horrible product and only 30 days of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. It won't turn off after it is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Felong

customer_reviews.title: Terrible face brush
customer_reviews.text: The brush doesn’t even stay on. It’s too expensive to have this many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Remington XR1400 Verso Wet & Dry Men's Shaver & Trimmer Grooming Kit, Men's Electric Razor, Facial Cleaning Brush, Beard Trimmer
product_meta.description: Style Name:3 Piece with Shaver HeadRemington Verso is the complete solution for men's shaving, grooming, and cleansing needs. This must have tool features everything you need for a complete grooming routine: Cleansing brush, Shaver and Trimmer. The triple-head rotary shaver is the main attraction, designed for closeness and comfort in your daily shave. Its HyperFlex neck adjusts to any angle on your face and the PrecisionPlus rotary heads capture short and long hairs with every pass. Shaving, grooming, and cleansing, all with the same Lithium-powered base-Verso simplifies your daily routine with fast, exceptional performance.
feature_bullets: HyperFlex The innovative design allows the entire head to adjust to any angle, helping to reduce irritation and provide a smooth, comfortable finish
PrecisionPlus Heads Slots and holes comfortably shave both long hairs and short stubble at the same time
Ergonomic Design The shaver's smart design fits comfortably in your hand, with a rubberized grip that gives you total control
WETech This shaver is 100 percent waterproof, giving you the freedom to shave with foam, in the shower, or dry Plus, cleaning it is fast and easy
MAX Lithium Power The long lasting lithium battery provides 45 minutes of cordless runtime after just four hours of charging

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
